 Default destructor.

void init ()
 Members initialisation function, is called upon activating the object.

void draw ()
 OpenGL drawing function, is called whenever the engine's camera can see the object, draws the ship and shield.

void draw_shadow ()
 Shadow drawing function.

int step (int dt)
 State update function, is called once per frame, checks for input, moves the ship, fires the guns.

 Returns the object's mesh in a flyMesh object.

 Parameter information retrieval function.

 Checks for input form the keyboard and mouse.

 Multiplayer message function, sends the ship's position.

 Multiplayer message function, sends the ship's death data.

void mp_send_damage (int from, const flyVector &pushvec, float value)
 Multiplayer message function, sends the ship's damage data.

virtual void die (int killer, const flyVector &hitpos, int padindx)
 Kills the ships and prepares it for respawning.

void draw_game_status ()
 Draws information about the game on the heads-up display.

void create_powerups (int flag)
 Creates power-ups that will be dropped, after being hit by a Disruptor Missile.

void drop_powerups ()
 Drops power-ups after being hit by a Disruptor Missile.

void reset ()
 Resets the ship for respawning.

void get_foes ()
 Searches the space right in front of the ship, looking for enemy ships.

void sort_players_by_score (int *a)
 Sorts the array of players by their score.

 the angle in which a visible foe will have its name displayed on the screen.

float powerup_dropvel
 movement maximum velocity of the dropped power-ups.

float powerup_veldamp
 velocity damping factor for the dropped power-ups.

int powerup_gettime
 amount of time in miliseconds that a ship cannot take power-ups after being hit by a Disruptor Missile.

int waittime
 amount of time in miliseconds that a dead ship must wait to respawn.

int busypic
 picture to represent that the player is using the console or game menu.

birthpad* bp
 birthpad object where the ship should respawn.

Detailed Description

Ship class.

This is the main class for the ship. It integrates the movement, input and draw modules, and implements many features, special effects and other characteristics of the ship.

Fly3D Game Engine ver 2.0 - http://www.fly3d.com.br
